attributes.action: Pay for my decking on his expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please could you pay for my decking as with all the stealth taxes your government has introduced I am a bit short of cash now. I thought as MP's seem to pay for nothing out their own pocket perhaps you could put my decking through on your next expenses claim. The total cost will be £348.Thanks in advance. 
Yours one seriously pissed off, hard working, tax payer, blighted by the corruption and double standard within parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
